table_merge_rules.description: When a table starts with 'Continued from previous page', it should be merged with the table at the bottom of the previous page
When marker finds no blocks but humans can see a table, apply more advanced table detection algorithms
Tables with repeated headers like 'Revision Control' across consecutive pages should be merged
Isolated numbers or short text at page bottom may be part of a continued table

metadata.purpose: Improve PDF table extraction for tables split across pages
